original: HENWER, Per Johan Algot, Färghandlare, Trelleborg, f Trbg 10/6 88, gm Frida Thorell. Anst h konsul Gustaf Smith i Tbg 03—19, i Oljeraffinaderi Union i Malmö 19—26, start färg-, tapet- o kemikalieaff i Tbg 23, alltj inneh av denna, tillika vkst dir i AB Tbgs Motorimp. Styr.led i Skånes Färghandl.frn i fi år, dess sekr sed. 40, styr.led i Skånes Tapethandl.frn sed. bild, medverk v bild av Tbgs Köpm.frn 34 o dess ordf sed. dess. Led av hdls- o sjöf.nmd samt tax.nmdn. Medl av Tbgs Friv Skyttefrn sed. 04, styr.led sed. 06, sekr 07—19, v. ordf 19—26 o ordf 26—40, rev i Malmöh Läns Skyttefrb, fanj i SvRK, styr.led i Tbgs RK-kår sed. 29 samt kassa-förvalt i tio år. Medl av Druidorden sed. 13 o Odd Fellow sed. 21. Malmöh Läns Skytte-frbs ftjSM, SvRK:s ftjSM, Tbgs Friv Skytte-frns ftjGM o GMM. Hobby: Skytte.
translated: HENWER, Per Johan Algot, Merchant, Trelleborg, born in Trelleborg on June 10, 1888, married to Frida Thorell. Employed at consul Gustaf Smith's in Trelleborg from 1903 to 1919, at the Union Oil Refinery in Malmö from 1919 to 1926. Started a paint, wallpaper, and chemical store in Trelleborg in 1923, of which he was the sole owner. Also served as the managing director of AB Trelleborgs Motorimport. Served on the board of directors of Skånes Färghandlare for five years and was secretary from 1940. Served on the board of directors of Skånes Tapethandlare since its establishment and became its chairman. Participated in the establishment of Trelleborgs Köpmannaförening in 1934 and has been its chairman since then. Member of the trade and maritime council and the tax committee. Member of Trelleborgs Frivilliga Skytteförening since 1904, served on the board since 1906, was secretary from 1907 to 1919, vice chairman from 1919 to 1926, and chairman from 1926 to 1940. Auditor of Malmö County Shooting Association. Served as a corporal in the Swedish Red Cross. Served on the board of Trelleborgs RK corps since 1929 and was the treasurer for ten years. Member of the Druid Order since 1913 and the Odd Fellows since 1921. Swedish Red Cross's shooting championship, Malmö County Shooting Association's shooting championship, Trelleborgs Frivilliga Skytteförening's shooting championship, gold and silver medal. Hobby: Shooting.
